testcase.classname: As a user I must have possibility to authorize to Otus.ru
testcase.name: Authorization to Otus.ru

failure.message: Step [I enter <login> and <pass> into loginField] is defined with 2 parameters at 'com.cucumber.steps.MyStepdefs.iEnterLoginIntoLoginField(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)'. However, the gherkin step has 0 arguments. Step text: I enter <login> and <pass> into loginField

testcase.failure:
Given I navigate to Otus main page by 'https://otus.ru/'....................passed When I press Login button...................................................passed And I enter <login> and <pass> into loginField..............................failed Then I should see button '<Мои курсы>'......................................skipped
